item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>I thought I might suggest a birthday present idea maybe to those in the family struggling to know what to get me. I really enjoy Maeve Binchy books and the one I like the look of at the moment is called "Irish Girls about Town" written by various writers including Maeve Binchey, Marian Keyes, Cathy Kelly & Colette Caddle etc, Maybe this would be a presie idea for Si & Fi if not already decided.</p>
item.content:encoded: I thought I might suggest a birthday present idea maybe to those in the family struggling to know what to get me. I really enjoy Maeve Binchy books and the one I like the look of at the moment is called “Irish Girls about Town” written by various writers including Maeve Binchey, Marian Keyes, Cathy Kelly & Colette Caddle etc, Maybe this would be a presie idea for Si & Fi if not already decided.

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Matthew, have also been reading Dave Gorman and nearly finished - absolutely racing through it. Spent an hour and a half embarrasing myself on Tuesday by reading it in Starbucks and chuckling continuously!</p>
item.content:encoded: Matthew, have also been reading Dave Gorman and nearly finished – absolutely racing through it. Spent an hour and a half embarrasing myself on Tuesday by reading it in Starbucks and chuckling continuously!
